languages.text: "Фу ты! А законник что тут забыл? Слыхала, вы прижали Саргону — что б его на том свете гроксы драли — неужели решили за всю нашу братию взяться?"
"Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"
languages.original_text: "Фу ты! А законник что тут забыл? Слыхала, вы прижали Саргону — что б его на том свете гроксы драли — неужели решили за всю нашу братию взяться?"

traits.locale_text: "Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul — so what, now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"
"Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul — so what, now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"
"Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now, you've decided to go after the rest of us?"
"Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now, you've decided to go after the rest of us?"
"Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"
"Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"

languages.text: “呃！法务官怎么会跑到这种地方来？我听说你已经干掉萨戈纳了，愿格洛克斯兽在他的灵魂上拉屎。怎么，打算来抓剩下的人？”
languages.original_text: "Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: “呃！法务官怎么会跑到这种地方来？我听说你已经干掉萨戈纳了，愿格洛克斯兽在他的灵魂上拉屎。怎么，打算来抓剩下的人？”

languages.text: «¡Oh, no! ¿Qué hace aquí un agente de la ley? He oído que capturó a Sargona, que los grox devoren su alma. Bueno, ¿qué? ¿Ha decidido venir a por el resto de nosotros?».
languages.original_text: "Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, no! ¿Qué hace aquí un agente de la ley? He oído que capturó a Sargona, que los grox devoren su alma. Bueno, ¿qué? ¿Ha decidido venir a por el resto de nosotros?».

languages.text: « Pff... Qu'est-ce qu'un représentant de l'ordre fiche ici ? Il paraît que vous avez attrapé Sargona, ce fils de grox. Et maintenant, qu'est-ce que vous comptez faire ? Nous poursuivre jusqu'au dernier ? »
languages.original_text: "Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: « Pff... Qu'est-ce qu'un représentant de l'ordre fiche ici ? Il paraît que vous avez attrapé Sargona, ce fils de grox. Et maintenant, qu'est-ce que vous comptez faire ? Nous poursuivre jusqu'au dernier ? »

languages.text: 「うわっ！なんでここに法執行官がいるのよ？サルゴナは捕まえたって聞いたけど…蜥蜴牛が奴の魂を引き裂いたんだろう？で、どういうことだ？今度はあたしたちの残りを狙うってのか？」
languages.original_text: "Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: 「うわっ！なんでここに法執行官がいるのよ？サルゴナは捕まえたって聞いたけど…蜥蜴牛が奴の魂を引き裂いたんだろう？で、どういうことだ？今度はあたしたちの残りを狙うってのか？」

languages.text: "Öf. Kanuncunun burada ne işi var? Ruhunu grokslar yiyesice Sargona'yı haklamışsın. Ne oldu? Şimdi de geri kalanları mı temizlemeye karar verdin?"
languages.original_text: "Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: "Öf. Kanuncunun burada ne işi var? Ruhunu grokslar yiyesice Sargona'yı almışsın. Ne oldu? Şimdi de geri kalanları mı temizlemeye karar verdin?"

languages.text: "Ugh! Was macht denn ein Gesetzeshüter hier? Ich habe gehört, Ihr habt Sargona erwischt – mögen die Groxe seine Seele ausweiden. Und jetzt? Habt Ihr beschlossen, Euch auch den Rest von uns zu holen?"
languages.original_text: "Ugh! What's a lawman doing here? I hear you got Sargona — groxes gore his soul. So, what? Now you've decided to go after the rest of us?"

traits.locale_text: "Ugh! Was macht denn ein Gesetzeshüter hier? Ich habe gehört, Ihr habt Sargona erwischt – mögen die Groxe seine Seele ausweiden. Und jetzt? Habt Ihr beschlossen, Euch auch den Rest von uns zu holen?"
